syft.core.torch_ package¶

Submodules¶

syft.core.torch_.hook module¶

class syft.core.torch_.hook.TorchHook(worker=None)¶

Bases: object

add_worker(id, worker)¶
assemble_result_pointer(worker, registration, torch_type, var_data, var_grad)¶

Assembles a pointer to a remote Torch object. Pointers feel like real Torch objects, but they’re zero-dimensional until their contents are retrieved from their owners.

Args registration (dict): registration attributes for the pointer torch_type: the torch class to construct the pointer from

static compile_command(partial_func, has_self)¶

Assembles a JSON-serializable message from a partial function.

Args: partial_func: a functools.partial or functools.partialmethod

object wrapped around a torch command, its args, and its kwargs.

has_self: a flag for whether or not the function is a method.

hook_torch_module()¶

Overload Variable.__new__

hook_var_send_(service_self)¶
hook_variable()¶
overload_function(func)¶

Wrapper overloading partial objects of functions in the torch module. Compiles command, checks for Tensors and Variables in the args/kwargs, determines locations of all Tensors and Variables involved in computation, and handles the computation accordingly.

overload_method(service_self, method)¶

Wrapper overloading partialmethod objects of Torch object methods. Compiles command, checks for Tensors and Variables in the args/kwargs, determines locations of all Tensors and Variables involved in computation, and handles the computation accordingly.

static pass_func_args(func)¶

Wrapper gathering partial object from function call.

static pass_method_args(method)¶

Wrapper gathering partialmethod object from method call.

process_response(response)¶

Processes a worker’s response from a command.

register_object_(worker, obj, **kwargs)¶

Registers an object with the current worker node. Selects an id for the object, assigns a list of owners, and establishes whether it’s a pointer or not.

Args:
obj: a Torch instance, e.g. Tensor or Variable
Default kwargs:
id: random integer between 0 and 1e10 owners: list containing local worker’s IPFS id is_pointer: False
request_obj(obj, sender)¶

Request Torch object from sender.

send_command(command, recipient)¶

Send Torch command to recipient.

send_obj(obj, recipient)¶

Send Torch object to recipient.

var_to_pointer(var)¶
